document_data.name: The View from Stormwind Hill
document_data.author: [[Sambrin Ulgrythyn]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''The View from Stormwind Hill''''' was a book written by [[Sambrin Ulgrythyn]], Lord Sage of the city of [[Sammaresh]] in [[Lapaliiya]], written in the [[1341 DR|Year of the Gate, 1341 DR]]. The original manuscript was kept in the [[Candlekeep]] library.{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}
